title: problem with pixel 2 file transfer
content:
hello friends,
my pixel 2 won't connect with my computer to transfer files, it only appears to be charging, there is no USB Preferences on status bar  to change between file transfer, usb tethering or MIDI ... ect !
i tried a trick on developer options to change the "default USB configuration" to file transfer and connect the phone with computer but only charging phone and no notification on status bar to change between options !

i tried different cables but the same problem (i tried the same original cable of pixel xl and it work fine on it, but on pixel 2 not)  and i tried factory reset but still have the problem !
